page.title: 09 Employment.
page.content: Although this is an agricultural area, vey few local people are employed on the farms. Large farms which once employed between twenty and thirty full time workers are now run efficiently with three or four men. There are a number of women employed part time at two intensively managed poultry farms. In Dorset as a whole there are more people employed in education than in agriculture, and this is true of Winterborne Kingston, since there are many people working full or part time in local state and independent schools. For other employment people have to travel to Blandford, Wimborne or Poole where skilled work is available. The army camps at Blandford and Bovington and the Atomic Energy Establishment at Winfrith employ men. .
